column5: Just wondering if anybody knows who makes tube jigs in bluegill color and where i might be able to find some. Thanx in advance.   JEREMY

Right off hand I don`t remember seeing any bluegill tubes, I have seen grubs in color termed bluegill( Kalins?). Don`t know if they would help you, or how close you are trying to match a bluegill`s color. Seems to me the grubs were available up to 5 inch.  I use Junebug a lot, purple with green glitter. Better for L/M than S/M on tribs of Erie and inland lakes, watermelon blue glitter a better choice for smallies on most lakes I have fished. Any color can have it`s days though.
Fishing World in Hamilton has a great selection of tubes give them a call or drop in.
doin some bed fishin are we ?

They are not for me they are for my boss.He asked me about them and i said i would ask i figured someone would no where to get some he is going north for the bass opener and said he had great luck with them last year.Just could not remember where he bought them or who made them.Thanx guys.
